1569353016_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_1154_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Well, tbh I think this can be implemented without breaking backward compatibility, so we could try to make the features live from the very beginning. [...]

How do ZeroNet trackers keep track of files? By hash? Would it be possible to upload a secondary instance of each file on the tracker so that modified clients can find other clients with the same features more easily, maybe by appending some kind of suffix to the file name or something like that?
